extension.name: System - Component Dispatcher
extension.author: Herman Peeren, Yepr
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2013 Herman Peeren, Yepr. All rights reserved.
extension.description: This plugin dispatches a component using Jooctrine (Doctrine ORM in Joomla!). Version 3 is for Joomla3, using PSR-4 autoloading.
